title: Tracklib
description: At music startup Tracklib I worked across the whole website, notably creating animated landing pages, leading the design system & building interactive user interfaces.

body.raw:
## Landing pages Built various landing pages in close collaboration with the lead designer & CPO.
## Application UI Built music player UIs, loop mode, filtering, storefronts & articles backed by CMS.
## Design System Core maintainer of **@tracklib/kit**, the company‚Äôs internal design system. ## Onboarding Built an interactive onboarding experience teaching beatmakers how to use Tracklib‚Äôs loop mode & saving tracks for later. (Press ‚ñ∂Ô∏è & make sure to have sound on üîä).
